comments: Amazing Professor who really knows his material. If you go to lecture and actually do the homework and pay attention, you will do fine on the midterms. Makes Econometrics very easy to understand.

Sometimes he just doesn\'t make sense and needs someone else to clarify for him. But other than that, he\'s actually a good teacher. Yes, he DOES swear in class, but it just enhances the learning process!! Totally a teacher who cares even outside of class, he\'ll meet you at the pub for drinks..even if it\'s not to help with any econ material....
